thread.title: The Rise of the CIO in the C-Suite

author: wsjcom
title: The Rise of the CIO in the C-Suite
text:
The chief information officer is a role that has grown substantially in stature over the past few years. So what comes next for these tech executives?
The Wall Street Journal’s Nikki Waller spoke with Vinod Khosla, founder of Khosla Ventures and co-founder of Sun Microsystems, about the position of CIOs as technology evolves, social pressures on companies mount—and information officers stand poised for even greater leadership roles. Here are edited excerpts of their conversation.
...
